('flab', '贅肉'): That flab around his waist is stubborn
She works out to get rid of flab
她運動是為了消掉贅肉
Years of little exercise left me with embarrassing flab
多年缺乏運動讓我長了令人尷尬的贅肉
A good diet and workouts will melt the flab
良好的飲食和運動會消掉贅肉
('get a blister', '起水泡'): You can get a blister from new shoes
If you run barefoot you'll get a blister
如果赤腳跑你會起水泡
Make sure to wear socks so you won't get a blister during the hike
爬山時記得穿襪子，這樣就不會起水泡
If your shoes rub the wrong way your feet will get a blister quickly
如果鞋子磨擦得不對，你的腳很快就會起水泡
('Be left out', '被冷落'): I hate to be left out
She didn't want to be left out again
Make sure nobody will be left out this time
這次要確保沒有人被冷落
We talked about including everyone so no one would be left out
我們討論要讓每個人都參與，免得有人被冷落
If you keep excluding her she'll be left out
如果你繼續排擠她，她會被冷落
